rule.message: Avoid Calendar.getInstance use DateUtils
rule.name: XPathRule_1303219869

rule.message: Deleting root entity should cause deletion of related child entities.
rule.name: EIS coding rules-CascadeDelete

property.name: xpath

rule.message: Force to specify Association Table for ManyToMany
rule.name: EIS coding rules-AssociationTableShouldExistsForManyToMany

property.name: xpath
property.value: //ClassOrInterfaceBodyDeclaration[ ( ../../../../TypeDeclaration/*/*/Name/@Image='Entity' or ../../../../TypeDeclaration/*/*/Name/@Image='MappedSuperclass' or ../../../../TypeDeclaration/*/*/Name/@Image='Embeddable' ) and Annotation/*/Name/@Image='ManyToMany' and not(Annotation/*/Name/@Image='JoinTable') ]

rule.message: Force to specify FetchType for Object Graph Loading
rule.name: EIS coding rules-ObjectGraphLoading

property.name: xpath

rule.message: Force to create foreign key for associations.
rule.name: EIS coding rules-FKConstraintShouldBeSpecified

property.name: xpath

rule.message: Prevent of mixed JPA annotations declaration (both on fields and methods).
rule.name: EIS coding rules-JPAAnnotationsShouldBeDefinedOnFields

property.name: xpath

rule.message: Do NOT use System.currentTimeMillis, instead use DateUtils
rule.name: XPathRule_1303290639

rule.message: Prevent use of use Locale.getDefault()
rule.name: EIS coding rules-DoNotUseLocaleGetDefault

rule.message: Prevent use of EnumType.ORDINAL
rule.name: EIS coding rules-EnumShoulBePersistedAsStrings

property.name: xpath
property.value: //ClassOrInterfaceBodyDeclaration[ Annotation[ */Name/@Image='Enumerated' and not(( NormalAnnotation[ MemberValuePairs/MemberValuePair['value']/MemberValue/PrimaryExpression/PrimaryPrefix/Name/@Image='EnumType.STRING'] or SingleMemberAnnotation[ MemberValue/PrimaryExpression/PrimaryPrefix/Name/@Image='EnumType.STRING']) )] ]

rule.message: Force to specify length for string columns.
rule.name: EIS coding rules-DefineLengthForString

property.name: xpath
property.value: //ClassOrInterfaceBodyDeclaration[ ( ../../../../TypeDeclaration/*/*/Name/@Image='Entity' or ../../../../TypeDeclaration/*/*/Name/@Image='MappedSuperclass' or ../../../../TypeDeclaration/*/*/Name/@Image='Embeddable' ) and FieldDeclaration/Type/ReferenceType/ClassOrInterfaceType/@Image='String' and (not (Annotation/*/Name/@Image='Column') or (Annotation/*/Name/@Image='Column' and not (Annotation/*/MemberValuePairs/MemberValuePair['length'])) ) ]

rule.message: Force Entities to inherit BaseEntity.
rule.name: EIS coding rules-DomainShouldInheritBaseEntity

rule.message: Force to specify @IndexColum annotation for List type collections.
rule.name: EIS coding rules-IndexColumnForListShouldPresent

property.name: xpath

rule.message: Prevent use of use primitives in domain.
rule.name: EIS coding rules-DoNotUsePrimitivesForDomainModel

rule.message: Prevent of declaration @Transactional annotation on java intefaces and classes.
rule.name: EIS coding rules-TransactionalAllowedOnlyOnMethod

rule.message: Force to change toDateMidnight() to toDateTimeAtStartOfDay()
rule.name: EIS coding rules-PreventUsingToDateMidnightMethod

rule.message: Do not use org.joda.time.LocalDate.toDateMidnight() use instead org.joda.time.LocalDate.toDateTimeAtStartOfDay()
rule.name: EIS coding rules-AvoidUsingLocalDateToMidnight

rule.message: Avoid new Date() instead use DateUtils
rule.name: EIS coding rules-AvoidUseNewDate

rule.message: Don't use org.apache.log4j.Logger import, use slf4j+logback.
rule.name: EIS coding rules - log4j is replaced by logback slf4j+logback

rule.message: Prevent use of Calendar.getInstance()
rule.name: EIS coding rules-AvoidUsingCalendarGetInstance

rule.message: Do not use System.currentTimeMillis() use instead exigen com.exigen.ipb.base.datatypes.DateUtils class methods.
rule.name: EIS coding rules-AvoidSystemCurrebtTimeMillis
